title: EU Company Certificate for companies with limited liability

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Credential

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the organization for which the EU Company Certificate is issued (e.g. DID-subject)

capitalSubscribed.title: Capital subscribed
capitalSubscribed.description: The amount of capital that shareholders or members have committed to contribute to the organization at the time of  incorporation.
